post.text: Share this if you're voting today for National Early Vote Day! hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Tyler
comment.text: The Russians are trying to rig the election by releasing information about how we rig elections (Hillary Clinton)

replies.author: Kyleigh
replies.text: Russians have nothing to do with it.. Need to watch more news updates.. (the Judge Napolitano) Here's a 2 minutes Video by Judge Napolitano NSA Hacked DNC Not Russia! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MhYoxHuJ3cU

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: you really need to reread my post and catch the sarcasm and irony in the fact that I'm saying the Russians are trying to rig the election by releasing information on how Hillary Clinton rigs elections. it was supposed to be a joke
